name: Square Foot Technologies, Inc.
description: Square Foot Technologies, Inc. is a leading technology firm specializing in innovative solutions for the commercial real estate industry. Established in 2015, the company focuses on providing cutting-edge software and data analytics tools that empower businesses to optimize their workspace utilization, enhance operational efficiency, and improve decision-making processes. Square Foot Technologies offers a comprehensive suite of products, including space management software, workplace analytics, and a robust platform for portfolio management. The company’s flagship product, FlexSpace, allows organizations to visualize their office layouts, track employee movements, and analyze real-time data to maximize workspace productivity. With a commitment to leveraging technology to transform traditional real estate practices, Square Foot Technologies is at the forefront of the workplace revolution, aiding clients in adapting to the future of work. The company’s mission is to create smarter, more flexible work environments that foster collaboration and innovation, ultimately driving business growth. As businesses navigate the complexities of hybrid work models, Square Foot Technologies provides the tools necessary to thrive in an evolving landscape.

seo.meta_title: Square Foot Technologies, Inc. | Innovative Real Estate Solutions
seo.meta_description: Discover Square Foot Technologies, Inc., a leader in workspace management and real estate technology. Explore our cutting-edge solutions designed to optimize workspace utilization.

faq.question: What does Square Foot Technologies specialize in?
faq.answer: Square Foot Technologies specializes in innovative solutions for the commercial real estate industry, focusing on workspace management and data analytics.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Square Foot Technologies?
faq.answer: Jessica Lee is the CEO of Square Foot Technologies, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Square Foot Technologies headquartered?
faq.answer: Square Foot Technologies is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products offered by Square Foot Technologies?
faq.answer: The main products include FlexSpace and SpaceUtilization Pro for workspace management, as well as Workplace Insights for data analytics.

faq.question: When was Square Foot Technologies founded?
faq.answer: Square Foot Technologies was founded in 2015.
